censable 0.0.1
  • Reference

Recode Name by Abb

recode_name_abb.Rd

Replaces state abbreviation with state name

recode_name_abb(.data, .abb)

Arguments

.data

data.frame or tibble
.abb

column with state abbrevaition

Value

.data with column .abb replaced with state name

Examples

data('stata')
stata %>% recode_name_abb(abb)
